xtce:SpaceSystem.name: BogusSAT
xtce:SpaceSystem.xtce:LongDescription: This is a bogus satellite telemetry and telecommand database. The purpose of BogusSAT is to exercise the capabilities of XTCE and the XTCE View tool.

xtce:AuthorSet.xtce:Author: David Overeem, Member of the OMG SDTF and XTCE RTF

xtce:NoteSet.xtce:Note: The root SpaceSystem for BogusSAT contains the parameters needed to define the transport of data for any of the BogusSAT satellites in the fleet or constellation.
This document is used for unit tests and has deliberate errors. Do not trust this for examples.

xtce:AbsoluteTimeParameterType.name: POSIXTimeType
xtce:AbsoluteTimeParameterType.shortDescription: POSIX UNIX Time 'timeval' which is 2 unsigned 32 bit integers

xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.name: MissionType
xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.shortDescription: Reserved Mission Phase and Operating Modes

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: CCSDSPacket
xtce:SequenceContainer.xtce:LongDescription: Super-container for all CCSDS telemetry and command packets

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: CCSDSTelemetryPacket
xtce:SequenceContainer.xtce:LongDescription: Super-container for all CCSDS telemetry packets.

xtce:CommandContainer.name: CCSDSCommandPacket
xtce:CommandContainer.xtce:LongDescription: Super-container for all CCSDS command packets.

xtce:MetaCommand.name: CCSDSPUSTelecommand
xtce:MetaCommand.xtce:LongDescription: Super-Command for all CCSDS/ECSS PUS command packets.

xtce:SpaceSystem.name: SC001
xtce:SpaceSystem.shortDescription: This is the first spacecraft in the BogusSAT system

xtce:BooleanParameterType.name: Battery_Charge_Mode_Type
xtce:BooleanParameterType.shortDescription: This parameter indicates whether the charger is charging the battery

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Battery_Voltage_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This parameter describes the measured battery voltage
xtce:FloatParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: The battery on BogusSAT is a modeled by a typical flooded lead acid car battery.

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Battery_Current_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This parameter describes the measured current draw
xtce:FloatParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: The battery on BogusSAT is a modeled by a typical flooded lead acid car battery.

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Battery_State_Of_Charge_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: Calculated battery state of charge

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Solar_Array_Voltage_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This parameter describes the measured solar array output voltage at the charger
xtce:FloatParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: The solar array on BogusSAT is 10 230W Trina TSM-DA05 monocrystalline panels, wired in series.

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Quadratic_Demo_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is an analog parameter with a simple quadratic encoding

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Quadratic_Demo_SingleRoot_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a float quadratic encoding

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Quadratic_Demo_SingleRoot2_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a float quadratic encoding

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Spline_Demo_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a float spline encoding

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Spline_Quad_Interpolate_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a float spline encoding and unsupported interpolation

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Spline_Quad_Infinite_Slope_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a float spline encoding and infinite slope - no good

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Float_Missing_PolyTerms_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with no terms in a polynomial calibrator (invalid)

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Float_Missing_SplinePoints_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with no points in a spline calibrator (invalid)

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Float_Order0_PolyTerms_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with an order 0 polynomial calibrator

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Float_Order1_PolyTerms_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with an order 1 polynomial calibrator

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Float_Order3_PolyTerms_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with an order 3 polynomial calibrator

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_1_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a simple math operation calibrator

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_2_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a longer math operation calibrator

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_3_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with no operations in math operation calibrator

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_4_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with unsupported element in math operation calibrator

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_5_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with short stack in math operation calibrator

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_6_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with unsupported operator in math operation calibrator

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_7_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with lots of operators in math operation calibrator

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_8_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with lots of operators in math operation calibrator

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_9_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with lots of operators in math operation calibrator

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_10_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with arithmetic exception in math operation calibrator

xtce:BooleanParameterType.name: Solar_Array_Voltage_State_Type
xtce:BooleanParameterType.shortDescription: The operational state of the solar array voltage sensor

xtce:Parameter.name: SensorTime
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Measurement time of the sensor data

xtce:Parameter.name: SunSensorMode
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Operational mode of the sun sensor

xtce:Parameter.name: EarthSensorMode
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Operational mode of the earth sensor

xtce:Parameter.name: SunSensorLevel
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Illumination level measurement of the sun sensor

xtce:Parameter.name: EarthSensorLevel
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Illumination level of the earth sensor

xtce:MathAlgorithm.name: ComputeBatterySOC
xtce:MathAlgorithm.shortDescription: Compute the battery state of charge

xtce:CustomAlgorithm.name: ComputeBatterySOC_Custom
xtce:CustomAlgorithm.shortDescription: Compute the battery state of charge with custom algorithm

xtce:IntegerArgumentType.name: RW_UNIT_ID_Type
xtce:IntegerArgumentType.shortDescription: ID number of the reaction wheel

xtce:EnumeratedArgumentType.name: RW_PWR_STATE_Type
xtce:EnumeratedArgumentType.shortDescription: Flag to indicate if power should be turned on or off

xtce:MetaCommand.name: Set_Mission_Phase
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Set the bus electronics mission phase

xtce:SpaceSystem.name: Payload1
xtce:SpaceSystem.xtce:LongDescription: This is the primary revenue generating payload software monitor and control data.

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Basic_Float32_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float32 parameter with a simple float32 encoding

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Basic_Float64_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float64 parameter with a simple float64 encoding

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Basic_MilFloat32_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float32 parameter with a milstd float32 encoding

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Basic_MilFloat48_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float64 parameter with a milstd float48 encoding

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: Basic_int32_signmag_Type
xtce:IntegerParameterType.shortDescription: Generic signed 32 bit number with sign magnitude encoding

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: Basic_int32_twoscomp_Type
xtce:IntegerParameterType.shortDescription: Generic signed 32 bit number with twos complement encoding

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: Basic_int32_onescomp_Type
xtce:IntegerParameterType.shortDescription: Generic signed 32 bit number with ones complement encoding

xtce:IntegerArgumentType.name: Value32_Type
xtce:IntegerArgumentType.shortDescription: New value to set to 32 bit integer item

xtce:MetaCommand.name: Payload_1_Control
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Controls the state of payload operation

xtce:Argument.name: OUTPUT_POWER
xtce:Argument.xtce:LongDescription: Long Description of the output power argument

xtce:MetaCommand.name: Adjust_Payload_1_Config
xtce:MetaCommand.xtce:LongDescription: Modifies an internal configurable item at a provided address for the payload processor
